an4.211:1.3: A monk, nun, layman, or laywoman who is unethical, of bad character.
an4.211:1.7: These are the four that corrupt an assembly.
an4.211:2.1: Mendicants, these four beautify an assembly.
an4.211:2.3: A monk, nun, layman, or laywoman who is ethical, of good character.
an4.211:2.7: These are the four that beautify an assembly.”
